name: Inspired by Fear
description: When spreading fear to your enemies, you further embolden your allies.
prerequisites: Ability to perform dirge of doom.
benefit: Allies in the area of your dirge of doom receive a +4 morale bonus on saving throws against fear effects. At least one enemy must be in the dirgeâ€™s area and become shaken by the dirge for you and your allies to receive this bonus.
